abstract: Intel said it would initially aim its new microprocessor family, code-named Larrabee, at the personal computer graphics market.
snippet: Intel said it would initially aim its new microprocessor family, code-named Larrabee, at the personal computer graphics market.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  Intel is planning to release on Monday the first technical details of a new family of chips intended to soup up computer graphics and, eventually, a broad range of computing tasks.

headline.main: Intel’s Line of Graphics Chips Could Have Broader Uses
headline.print_headline: Intel’s Line of Graphics Chips Could Have Broader Uses
